mapper.select:
SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}

SELECT * FROM t_base_carrierunit WHERE IFNULL(f_status,'') != '3' AND (f_code like CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR f_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR #{keyword}='') limit 0,10
